result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Joshua John Emmer

defendant.name: Emmer, Joshua John
defendant.address: 1221 19th Ave S, Apt. 6, Wisconsin Rapids, WI 54495

records.addlTxt:
2:42 PM Defendant Joshua John Emmer appeared by video.  Attorney Roger L. Klopp appeared by video for Joshua John Emmer.  Attorney Clifford C. Burdon appeared by video for State of Wisconsin. 
Atty Klopp states that the defendant will be waiving the Prelim today and has discussed the waiver with his client.  Court questions the defendant regarding in-person appearance.  Defendant waives their in-person appearance today & will proceed by zoom. 

Court questions the defendant.  Defendant agrees with the waiver.  Court accepts the waiver of the Prelim.

  BY THE COURT:  Court finds probable cause that a felony was committed and this defendant committed it.  Case bound over for trial or further proceedings.

Atty Burdon filed the information electronically with the Court.  Atty Klopp and the Defendant received a copy of the information and waives its reading. Atty Klopp asks for an arraignment be set.

BY THE COURT:  Set arraignment
bond continued
Arraignment scheduled for November 7, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

ADDRESS INFO for Joshua John Emmer
Current: 1221 19th Ave S, Apt. 6, Wisconsin Rapids, WI 54495 United States  (Effective: 08-29-2022)
Prior: 1221 19th Ave S, Wisconsin Rapids, WI 54495 United States

2:12 PM Defendant Joshua John Emmer appeared by video.  Attorney Roger L. Klopp appeared by video for Joshua John Emmer.  Prosecuting attorney Brian J. Juech appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. 
Atty Klopp states that they are waiting on results from the crime lab; asks for another status.

BY THE COURT:  set status
bond continued
Waiver of Prelim scheduled for October 17, 2022 at 02:30 pm.
Waiver of Prelim on October 17, 2022 at 02:30 pm.

ADDRESS INFO for Joshua John Emmer
Current: 1221 19th Ave S, Wisconsin Rapids, WI 54495 United States  (Effective: 08-29-2022)
Prior: 2210 Gaynor Ave # A, Wisconsin Rapids, WI 54495
Status conference on August 29, 2022 at 02:00 pm.

2:15 PM Prosecuting attorney Clifford C. Burdon appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Joshua John Emmer not in court.  Attorney Roger L. Klopp appeared by video for Joshua John Emmer. 
Atty Klopp does not know where is client is.  Atty Klopp states that they are still waiting on results.  Atty Burdon requests warrant based on defendant's failure to appear.  

BY THE COURT:  Warrant will issue.

2:07 PM Prosecuting attorney Clifford C. Burdon appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Joshua John Emmer appeared by video.  Attorney Roger L. Klopp appeared by video for Joshua John Emmer. 
Atty Klopp states that parties are waiting on a test from the State Crime Lab and they won't be in until December.  Atty Burdon responds.

BY THE COURT:  set status
Status hearing scheduled for June 27, 2022 at 02:00 pm.
Status hearing on June 27, 2022 at 02:00 pm.

10:16 AM Defendant Joshua John Emmer in court.  Attorney Roger L. Klopp appeared by video for Joshua John Emmer.  Attorney Clifford C. Burdon appeared by video for State of Wisconsin. 
Atty Klopp states that he and the Defendant received a copy of the criminal complaint & waives it's reading. Atty Klopp states that the defendant will waive time limits.  Defendant states that he hasn't spoke with his Attorney.
Recess 
10:23am  BACK ON THE RECORD
Atty Klopp waives the time limits for the Prelim.  Defendant agrees.

BYTHE COURT:  Defendant waives time limits for the preliminary hearing. 
bond continued
Status hearing scheduled for May 23, 2022 at 02:00 pm.
Status hearing on May 23, 2022 at 02:00 pm.

records.addlTxt: Initial appearance on April 25, 2022 at 10:00 am.
*No use or possession of any controlled substance without a valid prescription  *No operation of a motor vehicle without a valid drivers license

03:45 PM Defendant Joshua John Emmer appeared by video means (in custody). Prosecuting Atty Clifford C. Burdon appeared for State of Wisconsin.
Court advises defendant of charges.  Defendant received the complaint.  BY THE COURT:  Court previously found probable cause for Riverside purposes.
  Court advises defendant of right to an attorney.  Defendant understands.
Atty Burdon requests $250 cash bond with conditions.  BY THE COURT:  Court sets $250.00 cash bond with conditions.  Initial appearance scheduled for April 25, 2022 at 10:00 am.
